items.sentence: I didn't know both Tom and Mary were going to be there.
I bought a new pair of flip-flops to wear on the beach.
Having lots of free time, I've decided to study French.
You'd better avoid discussion of religion and politics.
It sounds as if the government doesn't know what to do.
I've retired and I'm going to take it easy for a while.
Here's some money. Try to spend it on something useful.
I know it's highly unlikely we'll see any whales today.
I didn't know that you were still high school students.
Tom wouldn't go back to Australia if he didn't need to.
